TextBlock.Text: <color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: <color=#EAF0B4>Reseircha</color>, I have completed the creation of the overclocking system.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: Due to the potential dangers of such high energy transfers, there is a security measure in place to prevent accidents.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: By targeting and drawing certain astral bodies together, the system will know that you are attempting an overclocked transfer.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: When attempting a transfer of this magnitude, be wary of your target. A misfire can destroy fragile objects.
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: Remember, this transfer should only be used to provide vital life-extending energy to stars. Do NOT aim directly this directly at a planet!
<color=#B3E2AE>ENGINELL</color>: With that out of the way, the code is 8-7-1-5-9-3.
